name: That Time I Tried to Become an Isekai Protagonist
name_original: That Time I Tried to Become an Isekai Protagonist
description:
This was my entry for the Mini Jam 22: Anime. It is not at all finished and it's basically a very very veeeery short demo.  And it may contain various mistakes for I was rushing like crazy xD I didn't even have time to add a decent title screen...

I plan on updating it as quickly as possible tho!

Original Game Jam Version is the Windows PC Version(Although HTML version is basically the same with some fixes). 

Instructions for HTML Version(Post Game Jam):

Arrow Keys to Move.

Z - Confirm

X - Cancel

Shift - Walk Faster

Extra Credits:
